slide_1.title: Baza Trainee Ukraine
slide_1.text: A public organization that provides initial work experience to those who are just starting their journey in IT.

slide_2.title: About Us
slide_2.text: Baza Trainee Ukraine is an educational and training platform that was built in response to Ukrainian society’s growing demands in the field of IT. It is a website that brings together two groups of users - students of IT and social projects in need of IT support.

slide_3.title: Baza Trainee Ukraine
slide_3.text: Громадська організація,яка має на меті отримання першого досвіду роботи тими, хто починає свій шлях в ІТ

history_project_section.title: Project history
history_project_section.text: Our project started in April 2023 with the aim of supporting and providing professional development for juniors and career switchers in the IT field.
history_project_section.text1: In a year, we have achieved significant success:

item1.text: Project launch of Baza Trainee Ukraine.

item2.text: The first thousand applications from participants for a total of 17 different projects, with 8 mentors.

item3.text: Four landing pages for military fundraising accumulated over 200,000 UAH, and more than 50 juniors were employed.

item4.text: The number of participants has increased to 1700. 35 projects have been successfully completed.

item5.text: During our work, we observe a complication in the level of projects — from simple landing pages to full-fledged websites with complex internal structures.

mentor_section.title: Mentor
mentor_section.paragraph_1: A mentor is a colleague two levels above the mentee who oversees task execution and provides guidance or clarification when the participant is unsure about a decision.
mentor_section.paragraph_2: Our mentors are practitioners from leading IT companies in Ukraine who aim to support newcomers with knowledge and enhance their own managerial skills.
mentor_section.paragraph_3: At Baza Trainee Ukraine, mentors guide a team consisting of several individuals, fostering their professional development simultaneously.

item_1.title: BAZA TRAINEE UKRAINE
item_1.text: A public project for juniors and IT switchers, focused on creating digital projects for the social sphere of Ukraine

item_2.title: BAZA SKILL
item_2.text: Our own recruiting agency for our graduates. A database of verified juniors with team development experience

item_3.title: BAZA EDUCAT
item_3.text: Educational courses of various difficulty levels for developers, teaching teamwork and collaborative development. Enhance your technical skills with soft skills and receive additional support in the job market

item_4.title: BAZA POLIGON
item_4.text: A web agency for small and medium-sized businesses. Established in 2023 in Ukraine and for Ukraine

question_1.title: What projects are we executing?
question_1.text: We create genuine digital projects on social topics for specific clients or internal purposes. All of them will be available online within a year, allowing you to showcase them in your portfolio. These are not abstract blocks but real products with social impact.

question_2.title: How to submit an application?
question_2.text: On our website, on the Internship page, under the 'Join the Community' button, there is a form to apply for participation in the organization's work. To participate, you will need an account on the Discord social network. If you don't have one, please open one and stay in touch with us.

question_3.title: Where can I familiarize myself with the terms of participation?
question_3.text: The details are on the Internship page.

question_4.title: Can one see the organization's projects?
question_4.text: All projects, whether in the team formation stage, in progress, or completed, are listed on the Projects page. You can also see the team composition responsible for each project there.

question_5.title: Can I choose the programming language I want to participate in?
question_5.text: So. If there are two or more programmers who want to practice Vue.js or Angular or Flask, we will select a project for the chosen technology. Come with your friends, it will be fun!

article_1.title: Ми в MC Today
article_1.text: Про старт проєкту, його розвиток, результати і статистику, про плани і цілі - в матеріалі інтернет-видання MC Today

article_2.text: Українські джуни з Baza Trainee створили лендинг Cats-law.site про  Закон України 2351 «Про жорстоке поводження з тваринами»

article_3.text: Як Baza Trainee Ukraine випускає свої продукти і чому відповідальний провайдер є обов`язковою частиною кожного проєкту
